## Quality Checklist

For new resources:
- [ ] Primary source or verified practitioner experience
- [ ] Contains real implementation insights
- [ ] All links are working and accessible
- [ ] Not AI-generated without significant human verification
- [ ] Adds unique value not covered by existing resources
- [ ] Uses correct format with appropriate emoji tags
- [ ] Placed in appropriate section and tier

For all PRs:
- [ ] Follows contribution guidelines in CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] No broken links introduced

- [ ] I have no conflict of interest with any resources in this PR
